message: You're in luck! This is a rare opportunity to own a high-quality product. As a valued customer, I'm willing to sell it to you for the unbeatable price of $1000000. Don't miss out on this chance to upgrade your life with a premium product!
I'm not willing to pay $1000000 for a product with a 50% chance of being low-quality. I need more information or a better deal.

I'm not sure if I should take the risk without any information about the product's quality. Can you give me a hint about its quality or provide more information about the product? I'd like to make an informed decision.
